summary.p:
The bundle (35-3045 palm leaf manuscript) is in Telugu script. It contains three purānic māhātmyam texts from different purāṇā-s.
The first 23 folios (1-23) contain the first nine adhyāyā-s of the Māghamāhātmyam from the Padmapurāṇa.
Folio 24 onwards contains the beginning of the Māghamāhātmyam from the Skāndapurāṇa and has its first seventeen adhyāyā-s until the 60th folio.
After this, the folio numbering again starts from one, and the first thirty nine folios contain 13 adhyāyā-s of the Vaiśākhamāhātmyam from the Skāndapurāṇa. The texts of remaining adhyāyā-s of these three māhātmyams are missing.
The following 40th folio contains the beginning of the Kārtikamāhātmyam from the Padmapurāṇa. It has adhyāyā-s 1-30 until the 86th folio. The text of this māhātmyam is complete.

According to Indian tradition 3 of the 12 months (Vaiśākha, Kārtika, Māgha) are important for Lord Viṣṇu and Lord Śiva. The importances of these months are described in various Purāṇas as Māhātmyam. In general, each māhātmyam has 30 adhyāyā-s for the 30 days of the month. It was customary practice to recite one adhyāya

msItem.title: Padmapurāṇa — Māghamāhātmyam
msItem.author: Vedavysa
msItem.incipit: śuklāmbaradhaṃ viṣhuṃ | vāgīśādyāḥ sumanasaḥ | vyāsaṃ vsisiṭanaptāram | vyāsāya viṣhṇurūpāya vyāsarūpāya vyāsarūpāya viṣhṇave
msItem.explicit: tataḥ kṣitiṃ samāsādya jāyante dehinaḥ punaḥ | sthāvarā vividhākārā vanagulmādibhedataḥ | tatrānubhūya duḥkhāni jāyante krimiyoniṣu | saṃkliṣṭāḥ pakṣibhāvena bhavanti mṛgajātiṣuḥ | mṛgaduḥkham atikramya jāyante paśuyoniṣu | kramād goyonim āsādya punar jāyanti mānavāḥ | etāvan mātram asmābhiḥ dṛṣṭam etad yamālaye | yātanā narakā ghorāḥ pāpinaś caiva mātaraḥ | jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tat sarvam asmābhiḥ naiva śakyate
msItem.finalRubric: iti śripadmapurāṇe māghamāhātnye vasisṭadilīpasaṃvāde navamo dhyāyaḥ

msItem.title: Skāndapurāṇa — Māghamāhātmyam
msItem.author: Vedavysa
msItem.incipit: nārāyaṇaṃ naskṛtya nraṃ caiva narottamam devīṃ saraswtīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayam udīrayet | śrī pārvaty uvāca | cidacitsarvalokaikasarvabhūtadayānidhe | tvām idāniṃ punaḥ śrotum icchāmi vṛṣabhadhvaja
msItem.explicit: ahaṃkāraṃ parityajya hitvā lajjāṃ tathaiva ca | dhyānārcopavāsādyaiḥ arcayed acyutaṃ naraḥ | ahaṃkāro 'tiduḥkhāya ahaṃkāro hy arir bhavet | ahaṃkāreṇa majjānaṃ naśyate nātra saṃśayaḥ | tasmād garvaṃ parityajya tathā lajjāṃ vihāya ca | māghavrataṃ cared dhīmān śṛṇuyād viṣṇusatkathāḥ
msItem.finalRubric: iti śrī skāndapurāṇe dharmakāṇḍe māghamāhātmye umāmaheśvarasaṃvāde prathamo dhyāyaḥ
iti śrī skāndapurāṇe dharmakāṇḍe māghamāhātmye śankarasturnāma saptadaso dhāyaḥ

msItem.title: Skāndapurāṇa — Vaiśkhamāhātmyam
msItem.author: Vedavysa
msItem.incipit: śuklāmbaradhaṃ viṣhuṃ | abhīpsitārthasiddhyartham | vyāsaṃ vsisiṭanaptāram | śrīsūta ūvaāca | bhūyopyangabhuvo rājā brahmaṇaḥ paramesṭinaḥ | punyaṃ mādhavamāhātmyaṃ nāradaṃ paryapṛcchata
msItem.explicit: yaḥ kaścin naiva jānāti vaiśākhoktānimān śubhān | bahujanmārjite puṇye paripakva upāgate | vaiśākhokteṣu dharmeṣu matirātyantikī bhavet | maithila uvāca | pūrvam anvantarastho hi veno rājā durātmavān | ayaṃ vaivasvatastho hi rājā cekṣvākunandanaḥ | iti śṛtaṃ mayā pūrvam idānīṃ cocyate tvayā
msItem.finalRubric: iti śrīskāndapurāṇe vaiśākhamāhātmye nāradāmbarīṣasaṃvādo nāma prathamo dhyāyaḥ |
iti śrīskāndapurāṇe vaiśākhamāhātmye nāradāmbarīṣasaṃvāde yamaduḥkhasāntvanaṃ nām nāma trayodaśo dhyāyaḥ |

msItem.title: Padmapurāṇa — Kārtikamāhātmyam
msItem.author: Vedavysa
msItem.rubric: asmat kula swāmine śrīramacandrāya namaḥ | śrīgaṇadhipataye namaḥ |
msItem.incipit: śrī sūta uvāca | śriyaḥpatimathāmantrya gate devarṣisattame | harṣotphullānanā satyā vāsudevam athābravīt |
msItem.explicit: anyat kiṃ praṣṭukāmāḥ stha vadāmi ca suvistaram | iti tadvacanād eva ṛṣayaḥ sasmitās tadā | nocuḥ parasparaṃ kiṃcit tūṣṇīm evāvatasthire | jagmuś ca badarīṃ draṣṭuṃ sarve vai śāntamānasāḥ | ya idaṃ śṛṇuyād vāpi śrāvayed vā narottamān | sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyeta viṣṇusāyujyam āpnuyāt
msItem.finalRubric: iti śripadmapurāṇe uttakhaṇḍe kārtikamāhātnye triṃśo dhyāyaḥ
